attributes.action: Jolly well insist that all vehicle drivers use their indicators on roundabouts and when lane changing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a trend nowadays to dive into short spaces between vehicles on dual carriageways etc.withought indicating. Sadly the standard of driving today has deteriorated quite noticeably and so has courtesy.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
